Storyline

Dominic and his crew thought they left the criminal mercenary 
life behind. They defeated an international terrorist named
Owen Shaw and went their seperate ways. But now, Shaw's brother, 
Deckard Shaw is out killing the crew one by one for revenge. Worse, 
a Somalian terrorist called Jakarde, and a shady government official 
called "Mr. Nobody" are both competing to steal a computer terrorism
program called God's Eye, that can turn any technological device 
into a weapon. Torretto must reconvene with his team to stop Shaw 
and retrieve the God's Eye program while caught in a power struggle
between terrorist and the United States government.
